lines.text: Thank you Timothy, that was beautiful and special.
Now, what have we learned today?

[sighing thankfully]
I learned to never, never ask my dad a question he doesn't have the guts to answer.

[about his daughter]
Who was that kid?

[disbelieving]
Nah nah. The one in the skirt.

[catching up with Katie]
Who was that? Was that, that Joey kid? The kid with the flying saucer truck? I saw the earring. You couldn't make a date with your father, you had to sneak a boyfriend into.
Dad, when I broke a date with Joey he thought I was dating another guy, he followed me here. Men are so insecure!

[about Timothy]
So, dad. What do you think? Perfect, right?

[almost lauging]
Yeah, wow. Yale, perfect. At last, perfect. Home by 11, perfect. I, uh... wait a minute. Chapter 52. He's too perfect!
